Title: Directs the state energy planning board to conduct a study on the future of power plants in New York state
Summary: Directs the state energy planning board to conduct a study and prepare a report on the future of power plants in New York state; provides for the repeal of such provisions upon completion of the study and report.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the energy law, in relation to directing the state energy planning board to conduct a study of the future of power plants in New York state; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
